name: BoidWatch
description: Feel a flock at your fingertips. An interactive flock simulation for VR.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core I5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 Storage: 4 GB available space Additional Notes: Each flock member interaction requires more power! If you spawn too many boids, you will crash. The better your computer specs, the more interacting boids you can have!
